subject: Running
College Athletics
Hodgkin's Lymphoma
Triathlon
lead_paragraph: Lukas Verzbicas, who will run at Oregon starting this fall, decided to compete in the junior world championships in the triathlon as a promise to a sick friend.
snippet: Lukas Verzbicas, who will run at Oregon starting this fall, decided to compete in the junior world championships in the triathlon as a promise to a sick friend.
